caption.p: Docking of the potential epitopes of the E1 protein of the Chikungunya virus with MHCI/II alleles. The images a, b and c show the interaction of HLA-A*35:01 with the three selected epitopes for MHCI molecules (details in the Supplementary Table S4). The images d, e and f show the interaction of HLA-DRB0101 with the first, second and fourth epitopes selected for MHCII molecules (details in the Supplementary Table S5).
